entry.title: Photos Post 35: Special Events (after 1975), Part 06
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos of the special event 1912-0000 Series D, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 mediums resolution from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 2 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1912.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, October 2024

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, October 2024

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month 115 new Photos were uploaded to 12 Pūjas as follows (44 high resolutions, 43 medium/high, 25 medium resolutions, and 3 low resolutions).
(i) 1913-0000 Pūjā: 1 medium/high resolution and 1 medium resolution uploaded, link India 1913.
(ii) 1913-0000 Pūjā: 3 medium resolutions uploaded, link India 1913.
(iii) 1913-0000 Pūjā: 10 medium/high resolutions and 1 medium resolution uploaded, link India 1913.
(iv) 1977-0216 Śhivarātri Pūjā: 18 high resolutions, 8 medium/high resolutions and 1 low resolutions uploaded, link India 1977.
(v) 1977-0321 Birthday Pūjā: 1 medium resolution uploaded, link India 1977.
(vi) 1979-0314 Holī Pūjā: 26 high resolutions, 19 medium/high resolutions, and 3 medium resolutions uploaded, link India 1979.
(vii) 1980-0000 Pūjā: 4 medium/high resolutions uploaded, link India 1980.
(viii) 1980-0214 Śhivarātri Pūjā: 4 medium resolutions and 2 low resolutions uploaded, link India 1980.
(ix) 1981-0321 Birthday Pūjā: 5 medium resolutions uploaded, link Australia 1981.
(x) 1983-0114 Śhrī Saraswatī Pūjā: 1 medium resolution uploaded, link India 1983.
(xi) 1983-0330 Birthday Pūjā: 6 medium resolutions uploaded, link India 1983.
(xii) 2000-1231 New Year Pūjā: 1 medium/high resolution uploaded, link India 2000.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
